Website: http://www.asus.com/products.aspx?l1=5&l2=24&l3=330&l4=0&model=1780&modelmenu

=== Current Issues ===
* Not working CAM (Intrepid)
* Digital out (builtin and via dock) need to add "options snd-hda-intel model=3stack-660-digout position_fix=1" in /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base

=== Fixed Issues ===
* No online bay docking/undocking (since 2.6.27-10.20, however eth1 is still an issue)
* No WiFi draft-N support
* Not working built-in wired NIC (Intrepid) - see the <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/263555|#263555]]</nowiki> bug
* Poor WiFi performance (Intrepid)
* Not working Wi-Fi button (Intrepid)
